      • isAllowUnsafeSslRenegotiation

        public boolean isAllowUnsafeSslRenegotiation()
        Tells whether or not the unsafe SSL renegotiation is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if the unsafe SSL renegotiation is enabled, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        setAllowUnsafeSslRenegotiation(boolean)

      • setAllowUnsafeSslRenegotiation

        public void setAllowUnsafeSslRenegotiation(boolean allow)
        Sets whether or not the unsafe SSL renegotiation is enabled.

        Calling this method changes the system property "sun.security.ssl.allowUnsafeRenegotiation" and "com.ibm.jsse2.renegotiate". It must be set before establishing any SSL connection. Further changes after establishing a SSL connection will have no effect on the renegotiation but the value will be saved and restored next time ZAP is restarted.

        Parameters:
        allow - true if the unsafe SSL renegotiation should be enabled, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        isAllowUnsafeSslRenegotiation(), setAllowUnsafeSslRenegotiationSystemProperty(boolean)
